NLP tools¶

class src.NLP_tools.nlp.NLP¶

Bases: object

Contain tools for NLP tasks.

cleaning(text) → str¶

Clean and tokenize a text.

Parameters

text (str) – text to be tokenized and cleaned.

opinion(cleaned_tokens_list) → float¶

Compute the opinion of a token list.

Parameters

cleaned_tokens_list (list[str]) – List of cleaned tokenized words.

src.NLP_tools.nlp.text_cleaner(input_text)¶

Clean, stemmatize and tokenize the input_text.

Parameters

input_text (str) – input text to be processed.
